scripts.deploy: npm install --include=dev --workspaces --include-workspace-root && npm run build --workspace client
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV='dev' && concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server"
scripts.verify:deploy: npm install --include=dev --workspaces --include-workspace-root && npm run build --workspace client
scripts.test: npm --workspace client test && npm --workspace server test && npm run verify:deploy && npm run verify:server
